@graph.caption: a loaf of vegan pumpkin carrot bread sliced on a chopping board

@graph.name: Vegan Pumpkin Carrot Bread - One Bowl - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Made in just one bowl this vegan pumpkin carrot bread is moist and full of delicious fall flavor thanks to pumpkin spices and pumpkin puree.

@graph.name: Vegan Pumpkin Carrot Bread
@graph.description: Made in just one bowl with simple ingredients, this vegan pumpkin carrot bread is perfectly moist and full of delicious fall flavor thanks to pumpkin spices and pumpkin puree.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups  flour (, I use 1.5 cups  all purpose mixed with 1/2 cup whole wheat/spelt )
3/4 cup shredded carrots (, pressed between paper towels if too moist )

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl mix all the wet ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl mix all the wet ingredients until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add one and a half cups of flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and spices and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add one and a half cups of flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and spices and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dates and carrots and mix in. At this point, you can add 3 tablespoons of coconut flakes (optional) and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dates and carrots and mix in. At this point, you can add 3 tablespoons of coconut flakes (optional) and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: The batter should be pretty thick. If its not stiff, add more flour a  tbsp at a time(moisture content in Canned pumpkin purees varies, you want a stiff thick batter)
recipeInstructions.name: The batter should be pretty thick. If its not stiff, add more flour a  tbsp at a time(moisture content in Canned pumpkin purees varies, you want a stiff thick batter)

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture into a parchment lined baking pan. Bake at 365 degrees F for 55 to 60 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the mixture into a parchment lined baking pan. Bake at 365 degrees F for 55 to 60 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 10 minutes then remove from the pan and cool completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 10 minutes then remove from the pan and cool completely.

recipeInstructions.text: Make your frosting and Frost after cooled completely.  Top with  vegan cream cheese frosting or cashew cream frosting or plain whipped coconut cream. Store: The bread can be stored on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a week.
recipeInstructions.name: Make your frosting and Frost after cooled completely.  Top with  vegan cream cheese frosting or cashew cream frosting or plain whipped coconut cream. Store: The bread can be stored on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a week.

@graph.keywords: vegan carrot bread, vegan pumpkin bread, vegan pumpkin dessert
